item.description:
Happy Zombie Weekend! Why Zombie?

Apparently some think Matthew 27:51-53 really happened.

At that moment the curtain of the temple was torn in two from top to bottom. The earth shook, the rocks split and the tombs broke open. The bodies of many holy people who had died were raised to life. They came out of the tombs after Jesus’ resurrection and went into the holy city and appeared to many people.

In other words, the story of Easter appears to have been more like a zombie event!? 
Hmmm... seems like a good excuse to have some fun with this and throw a party. You can think of it as a form of therapy for the many years you may have been subjected to the traditional christian resurrection story. We know that when the dead are resurrected, it means zombies!!!

Come join us celebrate... the obviously absurd?!!!

Pizza, dessert, punch, short videos, short game(s), and some bible zombie storytelling. Story/dessert time around 7:30pm. Zombie gaming time about 8:30pm. Any help with food/drinks is welcomed otherwise help with pizza/dessert cost will be greatly appreciated! If your coming please provide your preference on pizza toppings (also note food allergies, like cheese... and zombie meats).

Guaranteed, no Friday fish will be offered! 

~Darrick and Lindsay~
